title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to dxdt Scientific



Our logo


We specialize in environmental data, change detection, and data dashboards.
Our mission is to help organizations track and understand change over time.

title: About Us
text: dxdt Scientific focuses on environmental change, hydrology, and forestry data.
